check.name: snatcher_repeat
check.label: Loop
check.tooltip: Will start over when done until Stop is pressed or this checkbox is unchecked.

text.name: snatcher_minImgHeight
text.label: Minimum image height
text.tooltip: Images with a defined height below this are ignored

text.name: snatcher_minImgWidth
text.label: Minimum image width
text.tooltip: Images with a defined width below this are ignored

text.name: snatcher_ignore
text.label: Do not read URLs containing(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Will skip pages with one of the following in it's URL. (leave blank to disable)

text.name: snatcher_want
text.label: Read URLs containing(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Reads only pages with these in the URL. If the page matches both a skip rule and a read rule, the skip rule wins.

text.name: download_ingoreStrings
text.label: Do not download URLs containing(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Will ignore download items with one of the following in it's URL. (leave blank to disable)

text.name: download_wantStrings
text.label: Download URLs containing(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Downloads items with these in the URL. If the item matches both an ignore item and a want item, the ignore item wins.

text.name: snatcher_ignoreTitle
text.label: Ignore page if title contains(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Will skip the page if the title contains any of these. If the title matches both an ignore item and a want item, the ignore item wins.

text.name: snatcher_wantedTitles
text.label: Parse page if title contains(separate with ;):
text.tooltip: Will parse a page if the title contains any of these. If the title matches both an ignore item and a want item, the ignore item wins.
